name: ChromaSlime
description:
NOTE: You can press 'R' to reset the level

You are a slime in a dungeon and you must join yourself to other slimes in order to other slimes in order to create the shape required to pass the level. 

Colors are also important! Connecting to slime combines its color into your current slime, a white slime resets your color back to white.

You will encounter rotation blocks (only act on the main slime), bows (fire arrows based on moves) and boxes which you can move around.

CONTROLS
  • WASD / Arrow Keys
  • R to reset level.
TOOLS USED
  • Unity
  • Aseprite
  • Pixilart
  • Audacity
  • LMMS
THE TEAM
  • Rilabeast: programming
  • hesamzkr: programming
  • jgamer012: art / level design
  • Er4din: art

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam
